title: Banned for no reason
body:
Havent played in ages come back to log in and find out my account was permabanned, cant even find the email to why i was banned. please help.

Account name is Flying David

replies.body: Hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get the chance and make sure to pick the option "I need help recovering my account". It looks like there were some suspicious activities going on, but after verifying yourself as the creator of the account they'll be able to help.

Contact Riot Support through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and they should be able to explain why your account was banned. Note that support tickets are not read instantly and can take from a few hours to a few days to receive a response.
